sentences.english: The cometary ejection play a crucial role in formation and evolution of the meteoroid stream.
sentences.chinese: 彗星的喷发速度在流星群的演化过程中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Studies on meteoroid streams are briefly and systematically presented.
sentences.chinese: 对流星群的研究作了简明而系统的介绍。

sentences.english: Starbursts may have more subtle effects as well.
sentences.chinese: 星群爆发的影响也许更要复杂。

sentences.english: Maybe along the way I can check the meteoroids.
sentences.chinese: 没准我顺便还可以研究研究那流星群。

sentences.english: And hid his face aimed a crowd of stars.
sentences.chinese: 在密密星群里埋藏着它的赧颜。

sentences.english: MonitorTwo revealed a cluster of stars, tons of them surrounded by extraordinarycolors and formations.
sentences.chinese: 二号摄像头拍下了星群，周围是些奇怪的颜色和形态。

sentences.english: We lay down and looked at the sky, and I saw for the first time all these meteors.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起躺下，望著天空，我第一次看到流星群。

sentences.english: And hid his face amid a crowd of stars.
sentences.chinese: 在密密星群里埋藏着他的赧颜。

sentences.english: The launch is the first stage in the key Cluster II programme.
sentences.chinese: 这次发射是“星群二号”太空船计划的实施第一步。

sentences.english: Still later, those groupings were linked to comets.
sentences.chinese: 再后来，这些流星群才被与彗星联系起来。

sentences.english: That, in turn, is good evidence of a starburst.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，这很好地证明了星群爆发的存在。

sentences.english: The shooting stars are falling at a speed of 66 km per second.
sentences.chinese: 该流星群速度可达每秒66公里。

sentences.english: It isn't far from the graceful Circlet asterism in the constellation Pisces.
sentences.chinese: 它的不远处，就是带有优雅头箍的双鱼座星群。

sentences.english: The Pleiades star cluster is also called the Seven Sisters.
sentences.chinese: 昴宿星群同时也被称为“七姐妹星团”。

definition: see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
Arcturus (brightest star in the constellation Boötes 牧伕座|牧夫座[Mu4 fu1 zuo4])
Sirius, a double star in constellation Canis Major 大犬座
many stars/a vast sky full of stars
